channel.title: Need 1 coder, not alot of work, will reward you
channel.description:
Im not sure if this is the correct area, i couldnt find the right forums so please move this if im in the wrong place.
Specs. 317, [pi] Base = Deathlypvpz v4.
Alright so im on a dead-line to finish up my server, me & a friend are re-opening it, its called TripPk. Now, we have already purchased a 2 year web-page & are currently purchasing a very high-end vps. I am the developer for the source, I have already completed most of the required work yet i have some problems i cannot seem to fix. So if anyone would like to be code with me i can guarantee you a permanent staff position.
I require 2 things which are fairly easy, yet i do not have the time for right now.. Auto-cache downloader. Fix difficulty system.
I implemented a difficulty system like soulsplit with the help of sk8rdude, everything works fine except xp rates, which is all you have to fix.
If you are interested please post below, with your name, amount of experience & when you can code with me. And i will provide you with more details regarding these issues.
Thank you, sincerely - Absynth
